Topics for the weeks that are following that are as follows:

1)more proposed new character class - promotions of existing classes  
only - each proposed new character gets 3 days before I move on 
unless discussion picks up. I know of at least 3 proposed new promoted 
 character classes for this category (high priest, asassin, practical 
 mage). - Also, I'll be releasing my scenario trivia contest 
questions.  I will not mind if someone wants to add more questions to 
the scenario trivia contest.
 
2)Game Issues of Health, Potions of Magic, and Mana - yep, we will 
be talking about health and mana of characters for a week. Somehow, it 
 will be tied to Hybrid/dual class discussion.
 
3)3 weeks on hybrid/dual class - we'll just have to wait and see why 
I want to handle this in 3 parts.
 
4)Game Issues of Potion of Speed, Speed, and Teleporters
 
5)Game Issues of Generators

6)Game Issues of Experience Points & Experience Levels
 
7)Game Issues of Basic Intelligence for characters - Scenario trivia 
contest answers need to be emailed to me by this week.

8)Scenario Trivia Contest - I'll hit answers to the objective 
questions first  during the first week, then tackle 2-3 objective 
questions at a time.  That's going to take 4 weeks minimum to go 
through those.

9)Critique of dph's legimate scenarios.  Don't worry I will not 
"punish" anyone for bad reviews.  This will take a few weeks and I'll 
also be listing what the heck was going through my mind when I 
designed each of my scenarios.  Hopefully I'll be finished cleaning up 
my scenarios by then.

 * * * *

Since I know no person cares about this, I'll say it anyways, the next 
version of my scenarios will be a few days away.  It's going to take 
lots of time to do cleanup.  Maybe, I'll find a way to be happy with 
one of my scenarios.
